author: mmusich
body:
Biases to track impact parameters due to misalignment have magnitudes O(um). Showing them using cm as a unit implies that 99.9% of the times the y-axis scale will be multiplied by some negative power of 10 (up to 10^-5).
Hopefully showing these plots expressed in micrometers should help validators in gauging correctly the remaining bias.
title: [90X] OfflinePV/Alignment profiles expressed in micrometers
